title: Pamela Anderson dines with her sons Brandon and Dylan Lee at the exclusive Little Beach House Malibu
text:
She's gone from being a popular actress and model to focusing on her outspoken political activism.

Pamela Anderson took a break from it all on Monday to enjoy a casual lunch with her two sons, Brandon Lee, 23, and Dylan Lee, 21.

The 52–year–old Baywatch star dined with her boys at the exclusive Little Beach House in Malibu, a members-only spot that caters to the creative community.

Family time: Pamela Anderson took a break on Monday to enjoy a casual lunch with her two sons, Brandon Lee, 23, and Dylan Lee, 21, at the private club Little Beach House in Malibu

Pamela was dressed casually for the afternoon get together with a low-cut white T-shirt that highlighted her famous cleavage.

The 5ft7in model paired her top with some tight blue jeans that showcased her trim legs, as well as a classic pair of black heels.

Her blonde locks were styled messily, and she sported a pair of glasses cocked up over her head.

Low key: Pamela was dressed casually for the afternoon get together with a low-cut white T-shirt that highlighted her famous cleavage, along with jeans and black heels

Dylan matched his mom's low-key look with a plain white T-shirt and a pair of red sweatpants with white sandals.

Brandon made it unanimous with his own white T-shirt, which he wore with a paint-speckled pair of black shorts and weather white high top sneakers.

The three had dined at Little Beach House Malibu, an outpost of the London-based SoHo House.

The exclusive network of clubs around the globe requires members to pay multiple thousands of dollars for an 'all houses' pass, or a smaller fee to only gain access to a local club.

However, the ultra-exclusive Malibu house requires an additional fee for entrance in addition to the general pass.

Old romance: Pam's two sons come from her tumultuous marriage to rocker Tommy Lee. Most recently she was in a relationship with French footballer Adil Rami from 2017–2019; pictured in May

Pamela's two sons are from her tumultuous marriage to Mötley Crüe rocker Tommy Lee.

The couple got married only four days after first meeting each other.

The union was marred by a domestic violence conviction for Tommy, and they divorced in 1998.

Most recently, the Home Improvement actress was in a relationship with French footballer Adil Rami from 2017–2019.

Pamela has stepped up her activism in recent years with campaigns for animal rights and in support of WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange.
description: Pamela Anderson enjoyed a quiet lunch date with her sons Brandon and Dylan Lee at the private club Little Beach House Malibu. The actress and activist was dressed casually in a white T-shirt and jeans.
